Based on your preference cues, I would recommend "Dear John" and "What If...". 

"Dear John" is a romantic drama film directed by Simon West and starring Luke Benward and Scott Porter. The movie tells the story of a young man who falls in love with his sister, and what happens when he tries to pursue her.

"What If...?" is another romantic drama film directed by John Carpenter and starring Taliesin Jaffe and Ash Cook. The movie tells the story of two people who fall in love with each other, and what happens when they try to pursue their feelings.
